ioformat

Class IOARFFDiscretized

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.IOARFFDiscretized

  • public class IOARFFDiscretized
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that implements methods for data load and persistence to and from a modified version of the ARFF data format. The details of the basic format can be accessed at the following link: http://www.cs.waikato.ac.nz/~ml/weka/arff.html This class deals with the persistence of discretized data. This is discrete data that has been obtained by discretizing real-valued data. Therefore, both types of information should be persisted separately.

      • saveUnlabeled

        public void saveUnlabeled(DiscretizedDataSet discDSet,
                 java.lang.String outPath,
                 java.lang.String nonDiscreteDataPath)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes a DiscretizedDataSet object to a file. This method ignores data labels.
        Parameters:
        discDSet - DiscretizedDataSet object to persist.
        outPath - String that is the path to the output file.
        nonDiscreteDataPath - String that is the path to where the original non-discrete data is or will be persisted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public DiscretizedDataSet loadUnlabeled(java.lang.String inPath,
